title: Sally Yates Out After Disagreement With Trump  (Audio)
itunes:title: Sally Yates Out After Disagreement With Trump  (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Josh Blackman, a professor at South Texas College of Law, discusses the firing of Sally Yates at acting Attorney General after she refused to defend Donald Trump’s executive order on immigration. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
